item.title: api-tracking
item.description: Windows & Kubernetes APIs This document will grow into an API by API list of work that needs to be done to clarify Windows & Linux differences. This will be used to help clarify what needs to be eventually implemented (need a tracking issue), or not implemented (need a doc note). Volumes V1.Pod.Volumes Out of the various volume types, these should all be possible on Windows but tests are lacking:
